get.description: This api can be used to get the Activation Status of the Shipping Templates, which can be set through Walmart Seller Center. This activation status is not the same as the "status:ACTIVE/INACTIVE" of each shipping template.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Basic authorization header. Base 64 encodes the Client ID and Client Secret retrieved in step two of the integration steps.

parameters.name: WM_SEC.ACCESS_TOKEN
parameters.description: The access token retrieved in the Token API call

parameters.name: WM_CONSUMER.CHANNEL.TYPE
parameters.description: A unique ID to track the consumer request by channel. Use the Consumer Channel Type received during onboarding

parameters.name: WM_QOS.CORRELATION_ID
parameters.description: A unique ID which identifies each API call and used to track and debug issues; use a random generated GUID for this ID

parameters.name: WM_SVC.NAME
parameters.description: Walmart Service Name

activationStatus.description: Shipping Template Activation Status, possible values can be NOT_ACTIVATED or ACTIVATED

type.description: Shipping Template Type, should be CUSTOM or 3PL Specific

rateModelType.description: This is the shipping model type. TIERED_PRICING: This model means that you charge shipping based on the price of the item PER_SHIPMENT_PRICING: This model means that you charge shipping based on the weight of your items (per pound), or you charge shipping based on the number of items purchased in an order

status.description: Shipping Template Status, Can be ACTIVE or INACTIVE status

shippingMethods.description: Array of different ship methods of a Shipping Template

shipMethod.description:
| Attribute | Description | Data Type |
| ---- | ----------------- | ------- |
| VALUE | All Marketplace Sellers must offer Value shipping to Walmart.com customers for items that can't ship within expected transit times for standard shipping. | string |
| STANDARD | You are required to offer standard shipping to Walmart.com customers. | string |
| TWO_DAY | If approved for this option, you'll provide free 2-day shipping to customers and your items will be enabled with the TwoDay delivery tag. | string |
| FREIGHT | Heavy items which takes 6,7,8,9,10 days. | string |

status.description: Shipping Method Status, Can be ACTIVE or INACTIVE status

configurations.description: Contains an array of Regions, an array of Address Type, Transit Time and Per shipping charge or array of Tired Shipping Charge

regions.description: Supported Regions includes 48 State Street, 48 State – Street Po Box/Street, AK and HI – Street etc

items.description: Supported Regions includes 48 State Street, 48 State – Street Po Box/Street, AK and HI – Street etc

addressTypes.description: Supported address types like PO_BOX STREET MILITARY

items.description: Supported address types like PO_BOX STREET MILITARY

amount.description: The numerical amount for that charge. Example: 9.99

currency.description: The type of currency for the charge. Example: USD for US Dollars

items.description: Tiered Shipping Charges

get.description:
This API can be used to retrieve partner configurations like Seller Account & feed throttling values configured for seller.

The Feed Configuration block in the response shows the seller specific throttling configuration based on the tier of seller. If a new Seller is not assigned any tier, the block will be empty.

Please note that the default throttling configuration across Walmart and the API Throttling Response Headers can be found here
